models.name: todo_list_user
models.description: Primary user entity that owns all todo list tasks. This is a single-user system where each user has a unique identifier but no authentication is required. The system assumes the user is the person accessing the application from their device.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

models.name: todo_list_task
models.description: Task entity representing individual items in the todo list. Each task belongs to a single user and has a title, completion status, and creation timestamp.

foreignFields.name: todo_list_user_id
foreignFields.description: Belongs to the user who owns this task. {@link todo_list_user.id}.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: The text content of the task. Limited to 500 characters.

plainFields.name: completed
plainFields.description: Whether the task has been marked as completed. Default value is false.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated.
